node.text:
@CryptoCrunchApp - New Crypto App allows consumers to make payments in BTC.💥💥💥👇🔽👇🔽
.
.
A new Bitcoin app aims to revolutionize how everyday people interact with Bitcoin. By using a debit card or bank account, the Strike app allows consumers to make payments in BTC. The transactions are settled in dollars which get directly deposited to a merchant’s bank account. According to developer and Zap CEO Jack Mallers, anyone can link their bank account directly to Bitcoin, allowing shoppers to easily spend it and enabling merchants to simply accept it without having to interact with it.💥💥🔽👇🔽.
.
.

node.text:
Brad Sherman is now the chairman for the Subcommittee on Investor Protection.

The same man that said, “We should prohibit U.S. persons from buying or mining cryptocurrencies.”

node.text:
Anthony Pompliano, co-founder of Morgan Creek Capital, says that his confidence in Bitcoin is stronger than ever before, He teases the crypto community with confidence about BTC price in the future. He mentioned that his optimism on BTC is higher than ever before, Pompliano mentioned great trading volumes on CME and other crypto exchanges, which, as per him, means that both institutional and retail investors are now interested in BTC. Another thing that he mentioned was the approaching halving of Bitcoin, when BTC gets more scarce. .#⃣ checkout #cryptocrunchapp .
.

@CryptoCrunchApp: Popular Investor Bill Miller Has Been Buying Since $200.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Popular investor and fund manager Bill Miller shared that he has been buying Bitcoin since it was $200 and that was 2015 when Bitcoin dropped between $200 to $300 per coin. According to Miller, the average price he bought his Bitcoin was about $500. As of the time of writing Bitcoin is trading around $45,000 an indication that he would be on a 9000% gain if he is still holding on to the investment. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Wells Fargo, US Banking Firm Files With SEC For Bitcoin Fund Registration.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Wells Fargo recently filed documents with the US Securities and Exchange Commission, for the launching of a particular Bitcoin fund. This is positive sign of the growing adoption rate from US banking organizations. Also, Goldman Sachs, goes live again with its crypto trading desk and also filed for a Bitcoin ETF, BNY Mellon also activated digital asset managerial services for its customers while Morgan Stanley allowed its clients to access BTC through three funds. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: deVere Group CEO Believes Ethereum Will Outperform Bitcoin as Number 1.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Nigel Green, the CEO and founder of one of the world’s largest independent financial advisory organizations, the deVere Group, shared that he believes Ethereum's price value will surpass Bitcoin's price in a few years to come. And it's already outperforming Bitcoin and will continue on this path for the rest of the year. Ethereum is 300% up since the beginning of the year and Bitcoin is only 55% up, beating assets that stand as a benchmark. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

node.text:
@CryptoCrunchApp: US Based Mortgage Lender Plans to Accept Bitcoin Payments.🚀✴️🚀✴️

United Wholesale Mortgage - UWM, Michigan-based lender plans to accept cryptocurrency payments, starting with bitcoin later this year, according to the announcement during an earnings call on Monday by the CEO. CEO Mat Ishbia said Bitcoin would be first and then other cryptocurrencies like Ether will follow. This looks like a first for the mortgage industry within the United States. @CryptoCrunchApp: Biotech Company Converts Company Funds to Bitcoin For Long Term.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Spinesmith Holdings, a biotech company based in Texas with over $15 million yearly revenue, plans to convert the company's funds to Bitcoin to hold for the long term. This will enable the company to have access funds for projects without expressly seeking permission from the bank. CEO Kevin Dunworth said keeping the company's funds in Bitcoin is a major hedge against inflation and protection against “banking overreach.”💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Records Shows A 24% Growth Addition To Cardano’s Staking Addresses.🚀✴️🚀✴️

The Cardano ecosystem achieves more grounds as its native token, ADA now ranked as the fourth highest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, sees 14% addition to its staking wallets now at 754,978, which was formally 146,506 on June 3, 2021. These wallets has a mean value of $46.91 billion in ADA’s staked value following the new of Alonzo Purple upgrade, also ADA staking has being made available more for investors in different platforms.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Tesla Launched a Blockchain Pilot Product To Trace Cobalt and Nickel.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Tesla partnered with Re|Source, a firm focused on blockchain tracing, to launch a pilot project which will use blockchain to trace cobalt and nickel across its supply chain, according to the information revealed by Glencore, an Anglo-Swiss commodity trading and mining company. The pilot project is already being tested in Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) and Europe. Final pilot will run later this year with full launch in 2022. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Major European Football Signs 2-Season Deal Completely in Bitcoin.🚀✴️🚀✴️

The Netherlands’ PSV Eindhoven partnered with Anycoin Direct, a Dutch crypto company to receive complete sponsorship paid in Bitcoin. PSV is now the first European football club to get fully sponsored in Bitcoin. This partnership will last for two football seasons and PSV will be paid 400,000 euros per season. The football club commercial director, already prepared the crypto wallets that are required for facilitating payment and holding crypto.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Miners Revenue Increased By 57% Since June – Glassnode Data.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Glassnode’s recent on-chain data shows that revenue generated from Bitcoin mining have reached mid-2020 levels, increasing by 57 Percent since June. This is an indication that the mining hashrate is progressively increasing up to 25 percent since the China crackdown on miners which pushed them to migrate to Europe and U.S. Mining hashrate is presently at 112.5 EH/s. Increase in mining difficulty also means increase in revenue.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇
